ghcr.io/devcontainers-extra/features/ins.script: wget --no-check-certificate --post-data 'accept_license_agreement=accepted' --content-disposition 'https://www.segger.com/downloads/jlink/JLink_Linux_V852_x86_64.tgz' -O /tmp/JLink_Linux_V852_x86_64.tgz && mkdir -p /opt/SEGGER && tar -xzf /tmp/JLink_Linux_V852_x86_64.tgz -C /opt/SEGGER && rm /tmp/JLink_Linux_V852_x86_64.tgz && echo 'export PATH=/opt/SEGGER/JLink:$PATH' > /etc/profile.d/jlink.sh && chmod +x /etc/profile.d/jlink.sh && echo 'J-Link 8.52 installed and PATH updated.'
